transcript: mentorship benefits two people the mentor and the mentee the mentee learns skills they otherwise wouldn't with real-time faster feedback the mentor learns his main subject matter better because you have to teach it and the best way to learn anything is to try and teach it to someone else because if you see that you struggle to articulate it you usually don't know it as well as you think you do and so one of the best ways to learn a subject matter is to try and teach it I can't imagine a better way to spend time
